analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH and reduce public trust in Federally-funded science.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern that the proposed rule would politicize the NIH and undermine public trust in science, which aligns with opposition to the rule. It highlights the potential negative impact on scientific integrity and the impartiality of federally-funded research.
